verses.roman:
tabe vāsudeve prabhu kari' āliṅgana
tāṅra guṇa kahe hañā sahasra-vadana

synonyms: tabe—then; vāsudeve—Vāsudeva; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; kari' āliṅgana—embracing; tāṅra guṇa—his good qualities; kahe—began to explain; hañā—becoming; sahasra-vadana—possessing thousands of mouths.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu then embraced Vāsudeva Datta and began to speak of his glories as if He had a thousand mouths.
